alert.note: Alert for Page (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 5:22AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Page County through 545 AM CDT... At 521 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near College Springs, or 9 miles south of Clarinda, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Shambaugh around 525 AM CDT. Clarinda around 530 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
